agents

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • agents.Runner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Runner
extends jade.core.Agent
    Runs the simulation, and keeps track of information about the network. Run the simulation by launching JADE with this agent as a command line paramater. E.g.: java jade.Boot -gui runner:agents.Runner Will fail unless a file called P2PPowerLaw.properties is found in the top level directory of the project. This specifies required options for the Runner and the Agents in the system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateStats

        public void updateStats(jade.core.AID sender,
               boolean isConnected,
               boolean hasFoundFiles,
               int cumMsgCount)
        Stats messages are sent from Peers - add this information to the peer stats and message counts.
        Parameters:
        sender - Peer that's sending the stats
        isConnected - If the Peer has at least (min_connections) connected super peers
        hasFoundFiles - If the Peer has 'finished', i.e. transferred all their wanted files.
        cumMsgCount - Total number of messages sent by the Peer

      • totalFinishedPeers

        public int totalFinishedPeers()
        Returns:

      • simulationComplete

        public boolean simulationComplete()
        Determines when to 'stop'.
        Returns:
